confirmationMessage1.defaultMessage: All the data you input in Equipment Maintenance website will be deleted. It includes your asset, equipments, tasks, and entries and all the images you might have uploaded.
confirmationMessage1.description: Confirmation message before deleting the user

confirmationMessage2.defaultMessage: After the deletion, you will be logged out from Equipment Maintenance and you won't be able to reconnect.
confirmationMessage2.description: Confirmation message before deleting the user

confirmationMessage3.defaultMessage: If you want to keep proceeding, please type yes below:
confirmationMessage3.description: Confirmation message before deleting the user

placeHolder.defaultMessage: Type yes to confirm the deletion

title.defaultMessage: Deletion of all the user's data
title.description: Title of the delete user modal
